findings.title: Minor-risk code issues found
findings.description: The Owner Can set reward distribution by min period and min distribution (no maximum limit) and The return value of an external transfer/transferFrom return value is checked.

findings.title: The Owner Can set reward distribution by min period and min distribution (no maximum limit)
findings.description: The owner has the ability to set reward distribution with minimum period and minimum distribution but without a maximum limit.

findings.title: A03.The return value of an external transfer/transferFrom return value is checked
findings.description: The return value of an external transfer/transferFrom function is not properly checked.
